tool_description: Generate words for Charades and Pictionary Games!
name: Pictionary Charades Word Generator
title: Pictionary Charades Word Generator

api_list.name: Get Charades Word
api_list.description: Get a random charades word with the specified difficulty. If not difficulty is supplied, a random difficulty will be used.

api_list.name: Get Pictionary Word
api_list.description: Get a random pictionary word with the specified difficulty. If not difficulty is supplied, a random difficulty will be used.
